Posts.Content: Marcella wrote: Last Friday I did a self exam.  I found a lump in my left breast.  I went to the doctor on Monday.  He scheduled me for an ultra-sound and a mammogram.  This imaging guy - could not rule out cancer - so now I have to go see a breast surgeon.  No one can tell me what is in my breast.  I have to wait till the 28th to see the surgeon.  I am so scared.  I was just hoping someone had some advice for me???  It is just so hard to play the waiting game.  It looks like everyone is so kind and understanding - that is so nice to see.  This is a wonderful place to turn to for help! Thank you all in advance! Marcella Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Age 27 - Found a Lump Marcella smerf

Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2008 12:31PM Marcella wrote: Thank you all for your support!
